Institute for Research of Chats We are a non-profit institute dedicated to the art and science of Internet chat.
  • Join Us
  • About

    Institute for Research of Chats

    Chat is Serious. We study it.

    Join Us

    Our Mission

    Millions of humans and machines chat with each other every day to communicate everything from business strategy to love and affection, yet few have taken this very recent and powerful tool seriously.

    We are a community of developers and scientists who wish to build tools for chatting as well as publish analysis and research on the complex interplay of human dynamics over real-time textual mediums.
